caption.p: Antiproliferative activity by MTT assay of methanolic extracts of T. articulata. (a) methanolic extracts of different parts of T. articulata inhibits cell viability of breast cancer (MCF-7) cells. (b) methanolic extracts of different parts of T. articulata inhibits cell viability of colorectal cancer (RKO) cells. The data represent the mean value ± SE of three independent experiments * p < 0.05.
